page.title: 12LAMPLUGH CAMPING SITE.
page.content: The Inglenook caravan and camping site has been running for 6 years. The site is run by 3 people their jobs are: cleaning the toilets, taking bookings, working in the shop, doing repairs and clearing the rubbish from the site. The shop sells food and drink. The site closes from the 14th of November to the 1st of March. The people that run the site own 5 caravans that stay there permanently. There are another 16 caravans that stay there permanently but other people own them. If you are on holiday you can take your own caravan or tent and stay at the site. There were 5 caravans that people had brought to the site when we were there. They had 180 people in Whit week. More people caravan at the site than camp. It is a popular site and people who have been once often come again.
